message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming to sell it for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value, even at that price.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
